title: Ticket #182: Run-condor-branch.php should report test lacking builds
description: Run-condor-branch.php will helpfully report on workspace builds, a handy feature. (example) However, it only reports if there was a build. If you're testing tests, and thus only submitting tests, not builds, it won't show up. (example. Note the lack of two test runs since there with the same description.)
creator: adesmet
